name: Limb-o
description:
Limb-o is a platformer rage game. You start as a heart attached to a leg, and as you progress through the levels you get more limbs to help you on your journey.

Movement is akin to "Getting Over It with Bennett Foddey".

The whole game, including art and sounds was made in 1 week by me for the Brackey's game jam the theme of which was "Stronger Together". There may be bugs if you leave a comment I will try and fix them :)

There's an easter egg inside the game, the first 5 people to find it I will personally buy a real easter egg for so get hunting!
